snippet: The North Central Bronx Hospital’s labor and delivery unit was shut down last year, spurring protests from residents, hospital workers and community leaders. It has undergone a $2 million upgrade.
abstract: North Central Bronx Hospital, one of 11 public hospitals in New York City, is preparing to reopen its labor and delivery unit after $2-million renovation.
lead_paragraph: The North Central Bronx Hospital’s labor and delivery unit was shut down last year, spurring protests from residents, hospital workers and community leaders. It has undergone a $2 million upgrade.

headline.main: Bronx Hospital Is Set to Reopen Its Birthing Center After a Renovation
headline.print_headline: Bronx Hospital Is Set to Reopen Its Birthing Center After a Renovation

keywords.value: New York City Health and Hospitals Corp
